entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
